name: Cyto [Demo]
description:
Protect your cell!

As a plasma membrane enzyme, it's up to you to control what goes in and what comes out of Cyto, your needy, hungry cell-boss, and it sure isn't an easy job.

Quickly gather tasty nutrients, fight off invading viruses, and keep Cyto happy and healthy in this thrilling adventure through plasmic juices and bodily fluids.

Features:
  • Fast paced gameplay
  • 16 4 unique levels
  • Two-player coop mode
  • Portuguese (BR) version
  • Enzimes wearing helmets

Cyto was developed in 48h for the IGN Game Jam. Check out the other entries here.
